Plot: A fun weekend turns into madness and horror for a bunch of groupies looking for fun in a beaver infested swamp.
Title: Zombeavers
Writer: Al Kaplan (screenplay), Jordan Rubin (screenplay), Jon Kaplan (screenplay)
Actors: Rachel Melvin, Cortney Palm, Lexi Atkins, Hutch Dano
tomatoConsensus: Zombeavers obviously isn't high art, but it delivers just enough of the gory insanity promised by the title to earn a recommendation for genre fans.
